function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Outbreak of a novel coronavirus disease","Impact":"Global health crisis, economic recession, high fatality rate","Mitigation":"Vaccination, social distancing, lockdowns, border closures","Technologies":"Vaccines, contact tracing apps, testing kits","People":"General population, healthcare workers, essential workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Global economic recession","Impact":"Rise in unemployment, increase in extreme poverty","Mitigation":"Economic stimulus, support for affected industries, social welfare programs","Technologies":"Financial systems, economic modeling tools","People":"Workers, business owners, low-income individuals","Owner":"Government, international organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of sustainability in globalized system","Impact":"Vulnerability to global disasters, unequal preparedness","Mitigation":"Investment in sustainable practices, disaster preparedness training, ecological restoration","Technologies":"Renewable energy, sustainable agriculture, disaster management systems","People":"Policy makers, environmental activists, community leaders","Owner":"Government, NGOs"}]}
